thread.title: $2 -- New York City's 5-Star Knickerbocker Hotel at Inaugural Prices

title: $2 -- New York City's 5-Star Knickerbocker Hotel at Inaugural Prices
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > $2 -- New York City's 5-Star Knickerbocker Hotel at Inaugural Prices $2 -- New York City's 5-Star Knickerbocker Hotel at Inaugural Prices   October 8, 2015 at 5:35 PM Tweet 
In celebration of its 109th anniversary, the legendary Knickerbocker Hotel will drastically drop its rates to what they were when the five-star hotel opened back in 1906: only $2. The number of rooms selling at at this ultra-low rate is limited and exclusively found through the site, but at $2 a stay at such an iconic New York City landmark, entering the sweepstakes is certainly encouraged. 
The $2-a-night rate is only applicable on Friday, October 23, 2015. 
How to get this deal: For more information, to book, or to enter for your chance to win a $2-a-night stay , visit the Knickerbocker 's site. Regular rack rates for a superior room with a king-sized bed for October 23 starts at $463 per night. All sweepstakes entries must be placed by October 16, 2015. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
